Text.val: Author: Juergen Paarmann
program handels the internal prolongation of finance limit
selection of DEBTOR_CLIENT obtain with SQL-where-clause

BAD126 amount parameters = 0 instead of null

to be updated with null now instead of 0

< GNRL_NIGHTPROGRAMSDATE to DEBC_FINANCELIMITEXPIRY < GNRL_DAYPROGRAMSDATE
